column2: "Paul
column4: eso ɔnnam nyimpa do na mbom ɔnam Jesus Kraest nye Nyankopɔn Egya a onyaan Kraest fii ewufo mu no do no
column6: "nye enuanom nyina a wɔwɔ me nkyɛn
column7: dze kɛma asɔrasɔr a wɔwɔ Galatia nyina:"

column2: "Adom nye asomdwee a ofi Nyankopɔn Egya
column3: nye hɛn Ewuradze Jesus Kraest nka hom."

column2: "Ɔno a hɛn bɔn ntsi ɔdze noho mae
column3: ama oeeyi hɛn efi sesei bɔn wiadze yi mu
column4: dɛ mbrɛ hɛn Egya Nyankopɔn ne pɛ tse
column6: "ɔno na enyimnyam nka no mbersantsen mfesantsen. Amen."

column2: "Ɔyɛ me ahobow dɛ hom redan homho ntsɛm dɛm efi nyia ɔfrɛɛ hom wɔ Kraest Jesus adom mu no ho akɔ asɛmpa fofor bi mu a"
"ɔnnyɛ asɛmpa fofor biara so
column3: mbom binom wɔ hɔ a wɔretseetsee hom
column4: na wɔrepɛ akyea Kraest asɛmpa no."

column2: "Na sɛ mpo hɛn anaa abɔfo bi fi sor bɛka hom asɛmpa fofor bi ka dza yɛaka akyerɛ hom no ho a
"Dɛ mbrɛ yeedzi kan aka no
column4: sɛ obi bɛka hom asɛmpa fofor bi ka dza hom agye no ho a

column2: "Na afei nyimpa na morohwehwɛ enyimpa efi no hɔ anaa Nyankopɔn a? Anaa morohwehwɛ dɛ mosɔ nyimpa enyi? Sɛ meda ho mosɔ nyimpa enyi a
"Enuanom
column3: mepɛ dɛ hom hu dɛ asɛmpa no a meka no nnyɛ nyimpa dze."

column2: "Na manngye no nyimpa hɔ
column4: na mbom ɔnam Jesus Kraest ne nyikyerɛ do na minyae."

column2: "Hom atse nkan no m'abrabɔ wɔ Jewfo som no mu
column3: mbrɛ misii tseetsee Nyankopɔn asɔr no mbordo
column4: na mobɔɔ mbɔdzen dɛ mebɛsɛɛ no no."

column2: "Na mokɔr kan wɔ Jewfo som mu kyɛɛn m'etsipɛmfo dodowara
column4: na mobɔɔ m'egyanom atsetsesɛm ho mbɔdzen pii ma mpo ɔtraa do."

column2: "Naaso ber a ɔsɔɔ Nyankopɔn a ɔsaan mu yii me sii nkyɛn ansaana wɔrowo me no n'enyi
column3: na ɔnam n'adom do frɛɛ me no

column2: "dɛ obeyi ne ba akyerɛ wɔ mo mu
column3: ama maakɛka no ho asɛmpa akyerɛ amanamamfo no
column4: ntsɛmara menye honam nye bɔgya enntu egyina:"

column2: "eso mannkɔ Jerusalɛm wɔ hɔn a wodzii me kan yɛɛ asomafo no nkyɛn
column3: na mokɔr Arabia na mebaa Damaskɔs bio."

column2: "Na mfe ebiasa ekyir no
column4: na midzii ne nkyɛn dadu ndaenum."

column2: "Na asomafo nkaa no dze
column3: mennhu hɔn mu biara dɛ Ewuradze no nua James."

column2: "Dza merekyerɛw hom yi
"N'ekyir na mebaa Siria nye Silisia afamu."
"Nna Kraest n'asɔrasɔr a wɔwɔ Judea no nnhun m'enyim da:"
"na tse ara nna wɔatse dɛ
column3: Nyia nkan no ɔtseetsee hɛn no
column4: afei dze ɔreka gyedzi a ɔpeer dɛ ɔbɛsɛɛ no no ho asɛm papa."

column2: "Na emi ntsi
